hypothesis_content.title: ETH Gas Futures Launch Drives Short-Term Gas Price Volatility Spike
hypothesis_content.statement: The launch of ETHGas's blockspace futures market with $800M liquidity commitments will increase 7-day realized volatility of Ethereum gas prices (measured by ETH Gas Station's SafeLow metric) by >25% compared to the 30-day baseline within 10 trading days of the news date (Dec 24, 2025).
hypothesis_content.rationale: New derivatives products typically increase short-term volatility as market discovers price and hedgers/speculators enter. $800M liquidity commitment indicates substantial institutional interest that will test gas price discovery mechanisms.
entry_conditions: Current ETH gas price 7-day realized volatility < 30-day historical average
ETH price regime is NEUTRAL or BULL (to filter out bear market compression)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Gas volatility increases by 25% from entry baseline
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Gas volatility decreases by 15% from entry baseline after 5 days

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: ETH gas volatility remains flat or declines despite futures launch, suggesting market maturity or insufficient trader participation.
